name: Morphing Planet
description:
You are on a peculiar planet that changes shape, size and color continuously. Try to beat as many enemies as you can while avoiding bullets, picking up power-ups and moving above craters.

The planet is fully automatically generated with shader graph by using vertex displacement on a plane, so even though it looks like a sphere, it is infinite :)

The A.I. of the enemies and the autopilot of the player are made with behavior trees.

Preferably use a gamepad to play the game.

CONTROLS:

- Gamepad

  • Move: Left joystick
  • Rotate: Right joystick
  • Shoot: Right bumper
  • Autopilot: North gamepad button (PS Triangle/ XBOX Y)

- Keyboard

  • Move: WASD
  • Rotate: Arrow keys
  • Shoot: Space
  • Autopilot: P
